attributes.action: Stop spending vast amounts of our money on foreign wars and charities when so many of us are in need ourselves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are being taxed more than ever and yet the countries debt has risen.  We have much poverty and people suffrering here in our own country.  Taxes are the peoples money and should be spent only on services for us and not for political ventures such as war, foreign aid, subsidies, wasteful administration, etc. ITS NOT THE GOVERNMENTS MONEY, IT IS OURS!!

rejection.details: Please give a specific action for HM Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
